"use client";

import {
	Timeline,
	TimelineItem,
	TimelineMarker,
	TimelineContent,
	TimelineTitle,
	TimelineDescription,
} from "@/components/craftui/components/timeline";

export default function Particle() {
	return (
		<Timeline variant="vertical" className="max-w-md mx-auto">
			<TimelineItem>
				<TimelineMarker variant="fill" />
				<TimelineContent>
					<TimelineTitle>Step 1</TimelineTitle>
					<TimelineDescription>
						This is the first step of the process.
					</TimelineDescription>
				</TimelineContent>
			</TimelineItem>

			<TimelineItem>
				<TimelineMarker variant="fill" />

				<TimelineContent>
					<TimelineTitle>Step 2</TimelineTitle>
					<TimelineDescription>
						Intermediate stage of the timeline.
					</TimelineDescription>
				</TimelineContent>
			</TimelineItem>

			<TimelineItem>
				<TimelineMarker variant="fill" />

				<TimelineContent>
					<TimelineTitle>Final Step</TimelineTitle>
					<TimelineDescription>
						Congratulations! Youâ€™ve completed the journey.
					</TimelineDescription>
				</TimelineContent>
			</TimelineItem>
		</Timeline>
	);
}
